name: Anne Ananwune
memberInfo: Anne leads with passion and vision, driving innovation and sustainability across all company verticals. Her strategic mindset positions the team for long-term growth.

name: Jesse Akpomera
memberInfo: Jesse focuses on building strategic partnerships and expanding the business network. His expertise is in identifying new market opportunities and driving results.

name: Innocent Ekweogu
memberInfo: Innocent oversees technical operations and product architecture. With a strong background in engineering, he ensures the highest standards in tech delivery.
